actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To reduce until January 1, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 1996, the duty on: (1) a-n-butyl-a-(4-chlorophenyl)-1H,1,2,4-triazole-1-propanenitrile (myclobutanil); and (2) a(2-(-chlorophenyl)-ethyl)-a-phenyl-1H-1,2,4-triazole-1-propanenitrile (fenbuconazole).

titles.title: To reduce until January 1, 1997, the duty on certain chemicals.
